game.name: VRC PRO
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Sports
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: VRC Pro takes you deep into the world of cutting edge, modern RC cars. You can race up to 15 different RC cars on real existing mini race tracks all around the world; all fully customizable & tunable.
game.shortDescriptionEn: VRC Pro takes you deep into the world of cutting edge, modern RC cars. You can race up to 15 different RC cars on real existing mini race tracks all around the world; all fully customizable & tunable.

reviewHighlights.text: (Steam, doesn't allow neutral reviews) Doesn't work with PS5 controller - refunded.
i just like rc cars tbh
